mapper.select:
select
distinct
from M007KIJM
where (JAN_CD,HAKKO_DAY) in (select JAN_CD,MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M007KIJM
group by JAN_CD)
order by ${orderByClause}

select count(*) from M007KIJM
where (JAN_CD,HAKKO_DAY) in (select JAN_CD,MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M007KIJM where
group by JAN_CD)

mapper.sql: SHN_NM NAME, SHN_NM_R SHORT_NAME, ACT_KBN KUBUN
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from M007KIJM
where (JAN_CD, HAKKO_DAY) in (select JAN_CD, MAX(HAKKO_DAY) from M007KIJM
group by JAN_CD) AND DELETE_FLG = '0'
order by (ACT_KBN || HAKKO_DAY || HAKKO_DAY_TO) asc
